TopicTitle: Remove one letter from a movie title and describe the new movie in a single line

Articles.Content: Loan - one student's lifelong journey to solvency

TitNic - The weird highschool life of Nicole, a single breasted teenager entering puberty

Edited March 14, 2017 by Sigma88
it won't let me write it with a space :D
Avity: The search for the most enthusiastic person on the planet.

Pandrum.
A starship full of frozen villagers runs to another star. Several of them awake and make a party. With barbecue and folkish music.

The Secret Lie of Walter Mitty.

A thrilling action movie about a spy named Walter.

The Decent:  Hi-Diddley-Ho look into Ned Flander's extended family.

 

Shaun of the Dad:  Our hero returns from battling zombies, gets married and becomes Mr Mom.

Edited July 12, 2017 by Xorth Tanovar

The Waking Dead

Make your morning different.

Apollo 1, a movie about Apollo 1.

Edited August 21, 2017 by thekspbegginer
edit

Cleopara: Elisabeth Taylor rules ancient Egypt, she knows how to talk and she really wants a cracker.

Metropols: Futuristic vision of a robot hellbent on mastering Norwegian folk dances.

The Even Samurai: One mathematically gifted samurai must get along with 6 odd ones.

Jurrasic PaK: The stegosaurus may be well armoured but the rexes have a new weapon.

Intersellar: The traveling salesman problem, IN SPACE! (Yes, I realize it should be "seller", but it gets the point across)

Rrival - An alien must face its greatest rival, R.

Gravity.
(No letter changed, derived from grave + -ity) 
A soap opera about the personnel of cemetary and nearby fuel station, snack bar and shop.

Edited July 13, 2017 by kerbiloid
Gravit a movie where its danny against gravity...grav it!!!
The Mumy:  Will Robinson returns to Earth....

Car Wars a bunch of cars that start a war.

Edited July 18, 2017 by DunaManiac

Wynonna Ear.

About a little girl who liked to eavesdrop and tell the teacher.

Still lice- a louse gets dementia.

Mona- a teenage island queen goes on a quest to find the true subject of the Mona Lisa.

Jas- Swedish fighter jets attack... from underwater?

Nine lies- A dad can only tell lies- nine at a time.

Finding dry- a few fish try to find the last water in the ever shrinking ocean.

Blues Bothers- the story of Jake and Elwood Blues, two Chicago musicians who must get enough money to pay the taxes for an orphanage by playing annoying songs at a concert.

Meento- A man with chronic memory loss eats Mentos to cope.

The Martin- A guy named Martin is trapped on Mars, but dies there after Mark Watney steals all of his food in a paradox.

The Ego Movie: Lego minifigures must battle to be the most famous on a reality show.

Edit: Bonus movies adding a letter!

Bathman v. Supperman- much worse than before.

Citizen Kanye- No longer one of the greatest movies ever.

Edited August 17, 2017 by Confused Scientist

Scanners.

(No change. Just a sitcom about a servicing center).
The Tale Of The Princess Kaguy about a guy who pretends to be a girl, and becomes a princess
945: A movie about telephone operators in Fort Lauderdale, FL.

Ready Layer One: A movie about bricklayers in a virtual reality universe

Ampage: Someone tries to use massive speakers connected to ultra-high-power amplifiers to level a city

Tomb Aider: A movie about helping to build tombs

Wigs (1927)

Two young men struggle with the air war, love, and male pattern baldness.
Sol: A French movie about the Sun
Dadpool 2: Prepare for the second chumming.
Jars: the epic story of a grocery display which collapses.
